front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Recommended Practice for Learning Technology

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Open Archives Initiative Object Reuse and Exchange Abstract Model
front.abstract: This recommended practice specifies how the elements and attributes defined in the Open Archives Initiative Object Reuse and Exchange (OAIORE) Abstract Model and expressed in the OAIORE Resource Map Implementation in RDF/XML relate to the components of the conceptual model for resource aggregation defined in IEEE Std 1484.13.1-2012.
